title: Conduct Semi-Annual Preventive Maintenance Check
description: The PM needs to schedule and document a semi-annual preventive maintenance inspection for a property.

tasks.description: Notify the tenant of the upcoming inspection, providing at least 24 hours' notice.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal 'Notice of Entry' is generated and sent to the tenant.

tasks.description: Using a checklist, inspect key items like smoke detectors, HVAC filters, and look for signs of leaks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent completes a preventive maintenance checklist for the unit.

tasks.description: If any issues are found (e.g., dirty HVAC filter), create a work order to address them.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new work order is created to replace the HVAC filter.
